explains: n. （事件的）发生地点，（活动的）场所；<英，法律>审判地（指郡或区）

sentences.en: We're still trying to decide on a venue.
sentences.cn: 我们仍然在设法选定一个会场。

sentences.en: The venue was packed with 3 000 clubbers.
sentences.cn: 会场被3 000名俱乐部会员挤得满满的。

sentences.en: The venue for the World Cup remains undecided.
sentences.cn: 世界杯的举办地点尚未确定。
